multiple_choice_question.text: Which of the following statements is TRUE about the relationships between systems shown in Figure 1?
choices: GLcl is a subsystem of wGrzcl.

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the inference rule for modality in intuitionistic normal modal logic as shown in Table 1?
choices: From A → B, infer  A → B.

KM can be obtained by adding the axiom (sl¨ob) to mHC.
KM can be obtained by adding the axiom (wl¨ob) to mHC.
